name: Touhou - Fairy Dodge
description:
Touhou belongs to ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice.

My first game i have ever made so I hope you like it.

Play the game here: https://makecode.com/_HMRTgVDWz9mk

Story: Oh no Reimu is being chased by fairys and she needs to dodge them

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move

Use Z to shoot

Get power to fill up your power bar (if it runs out you die)

Get points to gain lives (the blue things)

If you run out of lives you die.

Also  you get one point each second you are alive for. What score did you get? (my highest was 125 can you beat it?)

Programming done by me. the music and some of the art done by my sister. (I made one fairy and she made another one then we both worked on the last one also i did the cover art)

And last of all Have Fun!!!

Also thanks for checking out my game.
